duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform deep cleaning of 3-5 1 BD apartments daily, including dusting, wiping surfaces, mopping floors, vacuuming carpets, pet fur removal, mattress and curtain cleaning, and replenishing supplies.
Follow standard procedures and clear instructions to maintain the cleanliness and integrity of guest rentals.
Document cleaning processes and any damages from guests, reporting to the team.
Approach all encounters with guests and employees in a friendly service-oriented manner.
Maintain high standards of personal appearance, including modest clothing.
Thoroughly clean and restock the required number of guest rooms per shift, remove trash and dirty linen from guest rooms, and perform other assigned tasks.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent (Some form of education is preferred)
